title: Conflict
content: From refuge to retaliation, and from tennis balls to bullets, Dick and Dom present some of the top 50 stories from the BBC Radio 2 Breakfast Show 500 Words competition 2018.

itunes.subtitle: Written for kids, by kids: stories about squabbles!
